title: Dinner Tonight: Spaghetti Squash With Butter Recipe
full_text:
Dinner Tonight: Spaghetti Squash With Butter Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
60 mins
Total
65 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
spaghetti
squash
2
tablespoons
butter
Salt
and pepper
Directions
Preheat the oven to 375°F. Split the squash in half lengthwise. When the oven is ready, toss in the squash. Cook for an hour.
Remove the squash. Simply scoop out the insides, trying to discard as many seeds as possible. Place in a bowl. Toss in the butter and season with salt and pepper.
Winter Squash
